text: kah do, "apane un gavaahon ko lao, jo isakee gavaahee den ki allaah ne ise haraam kiya hai." phir yadi ve gavaahee den to tum unake saath gavaahee na dena, aur un logon kee ichchhaon ka anusaran na karana jinhonne hamaaree aayaton ko jhuthalaaya aur jo aakhirat ko nahin maanate aur (jinaka) haal yah hai ki ve doosaro ko apane rab ke samakaksh thaharaate hai
